topic.title: Unhandled exception: AttributeError: 'ConfigPlugin' object has no attribute 'getCmdlineValue'
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: 0.7.1
  * Operating system: Windows 10
  * Web browser: Google Chrome
  * Tor status: not available
  * Opened port: no
  * Special configuration: ____

### Step 2: Describe the problem:
Error when opening zeronet client after trying to update.
#### Steps to reproduce:

  1. when starting zeronet click update py3 quickly
  2. click on update even if it's green background
  3. probably fail to open zeronet again

#### Observed Results:

  * What happened? This could be a screenshot, a description, log output (you can send log/debug.log file to hello@zeronet.io if necessary), etc.

#### Expected Results:

  * What did you expect to happen?

1604067689_mirrored_Noruka_github.body:
I was updating and it just did that, now when I open it it automaticly generates the issue report. It also opens a txt file:

/******************************/

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Users\WorkSpace\Desktop\ZeroNet-win-dist-win64\core\zeronet.py", line 16, in main
    import main
  File "C:\Users\WorkSpace\Desktop\ZeroNet-win-dist-win64\core\src\main.py", line 64, in <module>
    config.loadPlugins()
  File "C:\Users\WorkSpace\Desktop\ZeroNet-win-dist-win64\core\src\Config.py", line 466, in loadPlugins
    ConfigPlugin(self)
  File "C:\Users\WorkSpace\Desktop\ZeroNet-win-dist-win64\core\src\Config.py", line 461, in __init__
    self.createArguments()
  File "C:/Users/WorkSpace/Desktop/ZeroNet-win-dist-win64/data/__plugins__/1NAMEz7stUPZErkV1d3yLkVWQFa4PTqDNv/plugins\NameYo\UiRequestPlugin.py", line 32, in createArguments
    return super(ConfigPlugin, self).createArguments()
  File "C:\Users\WorkSpace\Desktop\ZeroNet-win-dist-win64\core\plugins\Zeroname\SiteManagerPlugin.py", line 69, in createArguments
    return super(ConfigPlugin, self).createArguments()
  File "C:\Users\WorkSpace\Desktop\ZeroNet-win-dist-win64\core\plugins\OptionalManager\OptionalManagerPlugin.py", line 239, in createArguments
    return super(ConfigPlugin, self).createArguments()
  File "C:\Users\WorkSpace\Desktop\ZeroNet-win-dist-win64\core\plugins\Bigfile\BigfilePlugin.py", line 791, in createArguments
    return super(ConfigPlugin, self).createArguments()
  File "C:\Users\WorkSpace\Desktop\ZeroNet-win-dist-win64\core\plugins\Benchmark\BenchmarkPlugin.py", line 347, in createArguments
    if self.getCmdlineValue("test") == "benchmark":
AttributeError: 'ConfigPlugin' object has no attribute 'getCmdlineValue'


/******************************/


So yeah, now when I try to run zeronet it dosen't open and it generates the issue.
I think the issue is with peermessage plugin. I have done a clean install and when I go to install peermessage plugin it crashes the zite.
